name: Mirror Glade
description: This is my entry for the Secret Spaces contest. I love fantasy and epic fantasy, so I knew my secret space would be based in a similar world. In Mirror Glade, you will find a wizards house, a waterfall for meditation, a Pavilion for study and rest, and a glade full of mystical waterfalls where you can sit and reflect. I wanted a space that had interesting shots based in directional light, and drew my inspiration from Sylvain 'Tohad' Sarrailh's art. Hope you like it!
